backpacks.name: Large Pack
backpacks.description: Unlocks the 2nd row of inventory (12 more slots, total 24).

backpacks.name: Deluxe Pack
backpacks.description: Unlocks the 3rd row of inventory (infinite slots).

stock.name: Rice
stock.description: A basic grain often served under vegetables.

stock.name: Wheat Flour
stock.description: A common cooking ingredient made from crushed wheat seeds.

stock.name: Bouquet
stock.description: A gift that shows your romantic interest. (Unlocked after reaching level 2 friendship with a player)

stock.name: Wedding Ring
stock.description: It's used to ask for another farmer's hand in marriage. (Unlocked after reaching level 3 friendship with a player)

stock.name: Dehydrator (Recipe)
stock.description: A recipe to make Dehydrator

stock.name: Grass Starter (Recipe)
stock.description: A recipe to make Grass Starter

stock.name: Sugar
stock.description: Adds sweetness to pastries and candies. Too much can be unhealthy.

stock.name: Oil
stock.description: All purpose cooking oil.

stock.name: Vinegar
stock.description: An aged fermented liquid used in many cooking recipes.

stock.name: Deluxe Retaining Soil
stock.description: This soil has a 100% chance of staying watered overnight. Mix into tilled soil.

stock.name: Grass Starter
stock.description: Place this on your farm to start a new patch of grass.

stock.name: Speed-Gro
stock.description: Makes the plants grow 1 day earlier.

stock.name: Apple Sapling
stock.description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Apple tree. Bears fruit in the fall. Only grows if the 8 surrounding "tiles" are empty.

stock.name: Apricot Sapling
stock.description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Apricot tree. Bears fruit in the spring. Only grows if the 8 surrounding "tiles" are empty.

stock.name: Cherry Sapling
stock.description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Cherry tree. Bears fruit in the spring. Only grows if the 8 surrounding "tiles" are empty.

stock.name: Orange Sapling
stock.description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Orange tree. Bears fruit in the summer. Only grows if the 8 surrounding "tiles" are empty.

stock.name: Peach Sapling
stock.description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Peach tree. Bears fruit in the summer. Only grows if the 8 surrounding "tiles" are empty.

stock.name: Pomegranate Sapling
stock.description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Pomegranate tree. Bears fruit in the fall. Only grows if the 8 surrounding "tiles" are empty.

stock.name: Basic Retaining Soil
stock.description: This soil has a chance of staying watered overnight. Mix into tilled soil.

stock.name: Quality Retaining Soil
stock.description: This soil has a good chance of staying watered overnight. Mix into tilled soil.
